revenue_streams.ecosystem_services: Biodiversity credits, soil carbon, water quality

competitive_advantages: Multi-revenue model reduces carbon price dependency
Scalable on degraded land (no food competition)
Mycelium binding creates durable carbon storage
Rapid deployment timeline (5-7 years to GtCO2 scale)
Policy-aligned with Farm Bill, IRA, EU Green Deal

licensing_terms.typical_deal: 2-5% revenue share on carbon credits + materials
licensing_terms.support_included: MRV protocols, pilot design, regulatory navigation
